faq_content:
Frequently Asked Questions:

Q: How fast is your delivery?
A: We offer delivery in 10-30 minutes for most areas.

Q: What payment methods do you accept?
A: We accept cash on delivery, UPI, credit/debit cards, and digital wallets.

Q: Can I cancel my order?
A: Yes, you can cancel orders before they are confirmed. Contact us immediately.

Q: What if I receive damaged items?
A: We offer full refunds for damaged or incorrect items. Contact us within 24 hours.

Q: Do you deliver to my area?
A: Check your delivery address during checkout to confirm availability.

Q: How can I track my order?
A: Use the tracking number provided in your order confirmation email/SMS.
